pr_title: feat: Sync app credentials between Cal.com & self-hosted platforms (#11059)

bugs_found_summary: Invalid Zod schema syntax in parseRefreshTokenResponse
parseRefreshTokenResponse returns safeParse wrapper not data
Missing prisma import in Salesforce CalendarService
Stale access_token used in jsforce connection
credentialId passed instead of userId to refreshOAuthTokens
refreshOAuthTokens returns Response when sync enabled (multiple callers affected)
res?.data undefined in GoogleCalendarService sync path

droid_missed: refreshOAuthTokens returns fetch Response when sync enabled
GoogleCalendarService res?.data undefined in sync path
golden_missed: credentialId vs userId mismatch in zoho-bigin

validation_notes.shared_bugs: Both correctly identified issues in parseRefreshTokenResponse: invalid Zod syntax, hardcoded refresh_token, and safeParse result return type
validation_notes.droid_unique_finds: Droid found 4 bugs golden missed: header case sensitivity, missing import, stale token usage, and parameter type mismatch. These are all real, critical bugs.
validation_notes.golden_unique_finds: Golden identified the refreshOAuthTokens Response/token mismatch affecting callers when credential sync is enabled. This is a real architectural issue Droid missed.
validation_notes.quality_assessment: Both sets of comments are high quality with no false positives. Droid has better recall (7/9 vs 5/9 bugs) and found more diverse bug types. Golden comments had excellent clarity and specificity scores.
